Mmanụ ala (Chinese simplified: 采油日记; Chinese traditional: 採油日記; : ) bụ ihe nkiri  nkiri China nke 2008 nke Wang Bing duziri
Emere ya na mpaghara Inner Mongolian nke Ọzara Gobi, ọ na-eso otu ndị ọrụ mmanụ ka ha na-eme ihe ha na-arụ kwa ụbọchị.
Dị ka ihe ngosi mpụta mbụ nke Wang—Tie Xi Qu nke dị awa itoolu: West of the Tracks — Mmanụ crude bụ ihe ama ama maka oke ogologo, na-agba ọsọ ruo nkeji 840 (awa 14)

Atụmatụ mbụ ahụ chọrọ ka e mee ihe nkiri nke awa 70, mana Wang chere na a manyere ya itinyekwu njikwa nchịkọta akụkọ ma belata ọrụ ahụ n'ogologo ya ugbu a. Onye nduzi ahụ n'onwe ya dara na ọrịa dị elu wee hapụ ebe ahụ ụbọchị atọ n'ime otu izu; ndị ọrụ ya mechara ihe fọdụrụ na-enweghị ya.

Crude Oil malitere (n'ime ihe ngosi vidiyo) n'afọ 2008 Ememme Nkiri Mba Nilel Rotterdam, ebe ọ natara NETPAC "Mention pụrụ iche" maka "ikpughe ya na-enweghị mmasị banyere ihe isi ike nke ọrụ mmadụ nke bụ ihe ndabere nke ọganihu akụ na ụba". IFFR nyere ọrụ ahụ, yana nkwado ọzọ sitere na Hubert Bals Fund. O nwere ihe ngosi mbụ ya n'Eshia n'afọ 2008 Hong Kong International Film Festival
Ihe ngosi mbụ ya na North America bụ na Los Angeles Film Festival na June 2009, na ngosipụta e mere na Gallery 6 na Hammer Museum.
